issue.title: unable to update to 4.2.0-Beta2 : missing semicolon in Mysql update file
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

I'm unable to update to 4.2.0-Beta2 (from beta1): missing semicolons in update file.
source:tags/4.2.0-beta-2/joomla/easysdi/com_easysdi_core/src/administrator/sql/updates/mysql/4.2.0-beta-2.sql
I suppose it's broken in pgsql too (maybe not in MSsql since semicolons are not mandatory in t-sql)

**Fixed versions :** 4.2.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Duplicate of  #755
Can be removed
